card_desc: [Espeon ex] | Stage 1 Pokemon | HP:140 | Weak:Darkness | Retreat:1 | Ability: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon. | Rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.

[Sylveon ex] | Stage 1 Pokemon | HP:140 | Weak:Metal | Retreat:1 | Ability: Once during your turn, when you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may draw 2 cards. | Rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.

[Giratina ex] | Basic Pokemon | HP:150 | Weak:Darkness | Retreat:2 | Ability: Once during your turn, you may take a Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon. If you use this Ability, your turn ends. | Attacks: {PPPC} Chaotic Impact 130 - This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself. | Rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.

[Darkrai ex] | Basic Pokemon | HP:140 | Weak:Grass | Retreat:2 | Ability: Whenever you attach a Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, do 20 damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon. | Attacks: {DDC} Dark Prism 80 | Rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.

[Eevee] | Basic Pokemon | HP:60 | Weak:Fighting | Retreat:1 | Attacks: {C} Growl - During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do −20 damage. | Text: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.
[Pichu] | Basic Pokemon | HP:30 | Weak:UNSPECIFIED | Retreat:0 | Text: It is unskilled at storing electric power. Any kind of shock causes it to discharge energy spontaneously.
[Magby] | Basic Pokemon | HP:30 | Weak:UNSPECIFIED | Retreat:0 | Text: This Pokémon is still small and timid. Whenever Magby gets excited or surprised, flames leak from its mouth and its nose.
[Sylveon] | Stage 1 Pokemon | HP:90 | Weak:Metal | Retreat:1 | Text: This Pokémon uses its ribbonlike feelers to send a soothing aura into its opponents, erasing their hostility.
[Espeon] | Stage 1 Pokemon | HP:100 | Weak:Darkness | Retreat:1 | Text: The tip of its forked tail quivers when it is predicting its opponent’s next move.

[Celesteela] | Basic Pokemon | HP:120 | Weak:Lightning | Retreat:4 | Ability: Once during your turn, you may switch your Active Ultra Beast with 1 of your Benched Ultra Beasts. | Text: One of the dangerous UBs, high energy readings can be detected coming from both of its huge arms.
[Silvally] | Stage 1 Pokemon | HP:110 | Weak:Fighting | Retreat:1 | Text: This is its form once it has awakened and evolved. Freed from its heavy mask, its speed is greatly increased.
[Naganadel] | Stage 1 Pokemon | HP:100 | Weak:Fighting | Retreat:2 | Text: It stores hundreds of liters of poisonous liquid inside its body. It is one of the organisms known as UBs.
[Guzzlord ex] | Basic Pokemon | HP:170 | Weak:Grass | Retreat:4 | Rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.

[Nihilego] | Basic Pokemon | HP:70 | Weak:Fighting | Retreat:1 | Ability: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon takes +10 damage from being Poisoned. | Text: A life-form from another world, it was dubbed a UB and is thought to produce a strong neurotoxin.

[Zeraora] | Basic Pokemon | HP:90 | Weak:Fighting | Retreat:1 | Ability: At the end of your first turn, take a Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon. | Text: It electrifies its claws and tears its opponents apart with them. Even if they dodge its attack, they’ll be electrocuted by the flying sparks.
[Kartana] | Basic Pokemon | HP:60 | Weak:Fire | Retreat:1 | Text: This Ultra Beast’s body, which is as thin as paper, is like a sharpened sword.
[Pheromosa] | Basic Pokemon | HP:70 | Weak:Fire | Retreat:1 | Text: A life-form that lives in another world, its body is thin and supple, but it also possesses great power.
[Buzzwole ex] | Basic Pokemon | HP:140 | Weak:Fire | Retreat:2 | Rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.
[Oricorio] | Basic Pokemon | HP:70 | Weak:Darkness | Retreat:1 | Text: This form of Oricorio has sipped purple nectar. It uses ethereal dance steps to call forth the spirits of the dead.

[Charizard ex] | Stage 2 Pokemon | HP:180 | Weak:Water | Retreat:3 | Attacks: {R} Stoke - Take 3 {R} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon. | {RRRCC} Steam Artillery 150 | Rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.

[Greninja] | Stage 2 Pokemon | HP:120 | Weak:Lightning | Retreat:1 | Ability: Once during your turn, you may do 20 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. | Attacks: {WC} Mist Slash 60 | Text: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water.  When it spins them and throws them at high speed,  these stars can split metal in two.
[Lugia ex] | Basic Pokemon | HP:150 | Weak:Lightning | Retreat:2 | Rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.
[Crobat ex] | Stage 2 Pokemon | HP:170 | Weak:Fighting | Retreat:1 | Rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.
[Ho-Oh ex] | Basic Pokemon | HP:150 | Weak:Lightning | Retreat:2 | Rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.

[Snorlax ex] | Basic Pokemon | HP:160 | Weak:Fighting | Retreat:4 | Ability: At the end of your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, heal 20 damage from it. | Rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.

[Eevee ex] | Basic Pokemon | HP:90 | Weak:Fighting | Retreat:1 | Ability: This Pokémon can evolve into any Pokémon that evolves from Eevee if you play it from your hand onto this Pokémon. (This Pokémon can’t evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.) | Rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.

[Flareon ex] | Stage 1 Pokemon | HP:150 | Weak:Water | Retreat:2 | Ability: Once during your turn, you may attach a Energy from your discard pile to this Pokémon. If you do, do 20 damage to this Pokémon. | Rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.

[Solgaleo ex] | Stage 2 Pokemon | HP:180 | Weak:Fire | Retreat:2 | Ability: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may switch it with your Active Pokémon. | Rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.

[Leafeon ex] | Stage 1 Pokemon | HP:140 | Weak:Fire | Retreat:1 | Ability: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may take a Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. | Rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.

[Rampardos] | Stage 2 Pokemon | HP:150 | Weak:Grass | Retreat:2 | Attacks: {F} Head Smash 130 - If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from this attack, this Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself. | Text: In ancient times, people would dig up fossils of this Pokémon and use its skull, which is harder than steel, to make helmets.

[Magnezone] | Stage 2 Pokemon | HP:140 | Weak:Fire | Retreat:2 | Ability: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks. | Attacks: {MMC} Power Beam 80 | Text: As it zooms through the sky, this Pokémon seems to be receiving signals of unknown origin while transmitting signals of unknown purpose.

[Magneton] | Stage 1 Pokemon | HP:80 | Weak:Fighting | Retreat:2 | Ability: Once during your turn, you may take a Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon. | Text: Three Magnemite are linked by a strong magnetic force. Earaches will occur if you get too close.
[Flareon] | Stage 1 Pokemon | HP:110 | Weak:Water | Retreat:2 | Text: Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac, heated,  and exhaled as fire that reaches over 3,000  degrees Fahrenheit.
[Skarmory ex] | Basic Pokemon | HP:140 | Weak:Fire | Retreat:2 | Rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.
[Donphan ex] | Stage 1 Pokemon | HP:160 | Weak:Grass | Retreat:3 | Rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.
[Magcargo] | Stage 1 Pokemon | HP:120 | Weak:Water | Retreat:3 | Text: Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames that circulate throughout its body.
[Dragonite ex] | Stage 2 Pokemon | HP:180 | Weak:UNSPECIFIED | Retreat:2 | Rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.

[Lucario] | Stage 1 Pokemon | HP:100 | Weak:Psychic | Retreat:2 | Ability: Attacks used by your Pokémon do +20 damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon. | Attacks: {FF} Submarine Blow 40 | Text: It’s said that no foe can remain invisible to Lucario, since it can detect auras—even those of foes it could not otherwise see.
[Leafeon] | Stage 1 Pokemon | HP:90 | Weak:Fire | Retreat:1 | Text: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you’ll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.
[Silver] | Supporter | Rule: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.
[Lusamine] | Supporter Supporter | Rule: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.
[Lillie] | Supporter Supporter | Rule: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.
[Will] | Supporter | Rule: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.
[Poison Barb] | Pokémon Tool
[Squirt Bottle] | Item | Rule: You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.
[Lum Berry] | Tool Pokémon Tool
[Cyrus] | Supporter Supporter | Rule: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.
[Magikarp] | Basic Pokemon | HP:30 | Weak:Lightning | Retreat:1 | Text: An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It may jump high on rare occasions but never more than seven feet.
[Swirlix] | Basic Pokemon | HP:60 | Weak:Metal | Retreat:1 | Text: It eats its own weight in sugar every day. If it doesn’t get enough sugar, it becomes incredibly grumpy.
[Tangela] | Basic Pokemon | HP:80 | Weak:Fire | Retreat:2 | Text: Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that grows nonstop even if the vines are torn off, this Pokémon’s true appearance remains a mystery.

[Cyclizar] | Basic Pokemon | HP:80 | Weak:Fighting | Retreat:1 | Attacks: {C} Overacceleration 20 - During your next turn, this Pokémon's Overacceleration attack does +20 damage. | Text: Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing people to ride on its back since ancient times. Depictions of this have been found in 10,000-year-old murals.
